00011 // distant.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "light.h"
00014 #include "shape.h"
00015 #include "scene.h"
00016 // DistantLight Declarations
00017 class DistantLight : public Light {
00018 public:
00019         // DistantLight Public Methods
00020         DistantLight(const Transform &light2world, const Spectrum &radiance, const Vector &dir);
00021         bool IsDeltaLight() const { return true; }
00022         Spectrum Sample_L(const Point &p, Vector *wi, VisibilityTester *) const;
00023         Spectrum Power(const Scene *scene) const {
00024                 Point worldCenter;
00025                 float worldRadius;
00026                 scene->WorldBound().BoundingSphere(&worldCenter,
00027                                                    &worldRadius);
00028                 return L * M_PI * worldRadius * worldRadius;
00029         }
00030         Spectrum Sample_L(const Point &P, float u1, float u2, Vector *wo, float *pdf,
00031                 VisibilityTester *visibility) const;
00032         Spectrum Sample_L(const Scene *scene, float u1, float u2,
00033                 float u3, float u4, Ray *ray, float *pdf) const;
00034         float Pdf(const Point &, const Vector &) const;
00035 private:
00036         // DistantLight Private Data
00037         Vector lightDir;
00038         Spectrum L;
00039 };
00040 // DistantLight Method Definitions
00041 DistantLight::DistantLight(const Transform &light2world,
00042                 const Spectrum &radiance, const Vector &dir)
00043         : Light(light2world) {
00044         lightDir = Normalize(LightToWorld(dir));
00045         L = radiance;
00046 }
00047 Spectrum DistantLight::Sample_L(const Point &p,
00048                 Vector *wi, VisibilityTester *visibility) const {
00049         *wi = lightDir;
00050         visibility->SetRay(p, *wi);
00051         return L;
00052 }
00053 Spectrum DistantLight::Sample_L(const Point &p, float u1, float u2,
00054                 Vector *wi, float *pdf, VisibilityTester *visibility) const {
00055         *pdf = 1.f;
00056         return Sample_L(p, wi, visibility);
00057 }
00058 float DistantLight::Pdf(const Point &, const Vector &) const {
00059         return 0.;
00060 }
00061 Spectrum DistantLight::Sample_L(const Scene *scene,
00062                 float u1, float u2, float u3, float u4,
00063                 Ray *ray, float *pdf) const {
00064         // Choose point on disk oriented toward infinite light direction
00065         Point worldCenter;
00066         float worldRadius;
00067         scene->WorldBound().BoundingSphere(&worldCenter,
00068                                            &worldRadius);
00069         Vector v1, v2;
00070         CoordinateSystem(lightDir, &v1, &v2);
00071         float d1, d2;
00072         ConcentricSampleDisk(u1, u2, &d1, &d2);
00073         Point Pdisk =
00074                 worldCenter + worldRadius * (d1 * v1 + d2 * v2);
00075         // Set ray origin and direction for infinite light ray
00076         ray->o = Pdisk + worldRadius * lightDir;
00077         ray->d = -lightDir;
00078         *pdf = 1.f / (M_PI * worldRadius * worldRadius);
00079         return L;
00080 }
00081 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Light *CreateLight(const Transform &light2world,
00082                 const ParamSet &paramSet) {
00083         Spectrum L = paramSet.FindOneSpectrum("L", Spectrum(1.0));
00084         Point from = paramSet.FindOnePoint("from", Point(0,0,0));
00085         Point to = paramSet.FindOnePoint("to", Point(0,0,1));
00086         Vector dir = from-to;
00087         return new DistantLight(light2world, L, dir);
00088 }
